SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT demandamedia.cd_material ,Estoque.Qtd_estoque Estoque_original ,ROUND(demandamedia.demandamedia / 4, 0) demandamedia ,Estoque.Qtd_estoque + isnull(Producao_saldo.Qtd_producao, 0) - ( ROUND(demandamedia.demandamedia / 4, 0) * ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( ORDER BY data ASC ) ) Estoque_saldo ,T.DATA ,DATEADD(DD, 6, T.data) Data_fim ,isnull(Producao.Qtd_producao, 0) Qtd_producao FROM AnalyzerDW..DIM_TEMPO T(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN demandamedia(NOLOCK) ON 1 = 1 OUTER APPLY ( SELECT SUM(Quantidade) Qtd_estoque FROM LC_vw_lotes_livres(NOLOCK) WHERE Cd_material = demandamedia.cd_material AND Cd_centro_armaz = 'EXPE' ) Estoque OUTER APPLY ( SELECT SUM(ISNULL(PCORPROD.Quantidade-PCORPROD.Qt_fabricada, 0)) Qtd_producao FROM PCORPROD(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN LC_COMP_PRODUCAO(NOLOCK) ON PCORPROD.OP = LC_COMP_PRODUCAO.OP WHERE PCORPROD.Cd_material = ':1' AND LC_COMP_PRODUCAO.Situacao NOT IN ( 'Finalizado' ,'Cancelado' ) AND LC_COMP_PRODUCAO.Data_Final between T.DATA and DATEADD(DD, 6, T.data) and LC_COMP_PRODUCAO.Processo = ':2' ) Producao OUTER APPLY ( SELECT SUM(ISNULL(PCORPROD.Quantidade-PCORPROD.Qt_fabricada, 0)) Qtd_producao FROM PCORPROD(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN LC_COMP_PRODUCAO(NOLOCK) ON PCORPROD.OP = LC_COMP_PRODUCAO.OP WHERE PCORPROD.Cd_material = ':1' AND LC_COMP_PRODUCAO.Situacao NOT IN ( 'Finalizado' ,'Cancelado' ) AND LC_COMP_PRODUCAO.Data_Final <= DATEADD(DD, 6, T.data) and LC_COMP_PRODUCAO.Processo = ':2' ) Producao_saldo WHERE NR_SEMANA_ANO BETWEEN ( SELECT NR_SEMANA_ANO FROM AnalyzerDW..DIM_TEMPO(NOLOCK) WHERE DATA = CONVERT(DATE, GETDATE()) ) AND ( SELECT NR_SEMANA_ANO FROM AnalyzerDW..DIM_TEMPO(NOLOCK) WHERE DATA = CONVERT(DATE, GETDATE()) ) + 11 AND ANO = DATEPART(year, getdate()) AND DIA_SEMANA = 1 AND demandamedia.cd_material = isnull(( SELECT Elemento FROM GEELEMEN WHERE Cd_tg = 505 AND Categoria = ':1' ), ':1') ORDER BY data
